trans-unit.source: Encapsulates the HTTP intrinsic object that contains HTTP-specific information about an individual HTTP request.
The <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper> class derives from the <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase> class and serves as a wrapper for the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper> classe dérive de la <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase> classe et sert de wrapper pour la <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> classe.

trans-unit.source: This class exposes the functionality of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class and also exposes the <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase> type.
trans-unit.target: Cette classe expose les fonctionnalités de la <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> classe et expose également le <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase> type.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase> class lets you replace the original implementation of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class in your application with a custom implementation, such as when you perform unit testing outside the ASP.NET pipeline.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase> classe vous permet de remplacer l’implémentation d’origine de la <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> classe dans votre application avec une implémentation personnalisée, notamment lorsque vous effectuez à l’extérieur du pipeline ASP.NET de test unitaire.

trans-unit.source: The object that this wrapper class provides access to.
Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper" /> class by using the specified context object.
<paramref name="httpContext" /> is <see langword="null" />.
Accepts an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request.
The user function.
Accepts an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request using the specified user function.
The <paramref name="userFunc" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The request is not an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request.
The user function.
The options object.
Accepts an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request using the specified user function and options object.
The <paramref name="userFunc" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The request is not an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request.
The exception to add to the exception collection.
Adds an exception to the exception collection for the current HTTP request.
The HTTP context object.
Raises a virtual event that occurs when the HTTP part of the request is ending.
The subscription token.
This event occurs before the <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> connection begins.
trans-unit.target: Cet événement se produit avant le <xref:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket> connexion commence.

trans-unit.source: The <paramref name="callback" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
Gets an array of errors (if any) that accumulated when an HTTP request was being processed.
An array of <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> objects for the current HTTP request, or <see langword="null" /> if no errors accumulated during the HTTP request processing.
trans-unit.target: Tableau d’objets <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> pour la requête HTTP actuelle, ou <see langword="null" /> si aucune erreur n’a été accumulée pendant le traitement de la requête HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether asynchronous operations are allowed during parts of ASP.NET request processing when they are not expected.
<see langword="false" /> if ASP.NET will throw an exception when the asynchronous API is used at a time when it is not expected; otherwise, <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> si ASP.NET lève une exception lorsque l'API asynchrone est utilisée alors qu'elle ne devrait pas l'être ; sinon, <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: The default value is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut est <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AllowAsyncDuringSyncStages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d'informations, consultez <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.AllowAsyncDuringSyncStages%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplicationState" /> object for the current HTTP request.
The state object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Obtient l’objet d’état pour la requête HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> object for the current HTTP request.
The object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Objet pour la requête HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an object that contains flags that pertain to asynchronous preload mode.
An object that contains flags that pertain to asynchronous preload mode.
trans-unit.target: Objet qui contient les indicateurs qui concernent le mode de pré chargement asynchrone.

trans-unit.source: Although this property can be set programmatically, changing the property value only has effect if the property is set before the <see langword="ExecuteRequestHandler" /> step in the ASP.NET request pipeline.
trans-unit.target: Bien que cette propriété peut être définie par programme, la modification de la valeur de propriété n’a d’effet si la propriété est définie avant le <see langword="ExecuteRequestHandler" /> étape dans le pipeline de demande ASP.NET.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Caching.Cache" /> object for the current application domain.
The cache object for the current application domain.
trans-unit.target: Objet de cache pour le domaine d’application actuel.

trans-unit.source: Clears all errors for the current HTTP request.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> object that represents the handler that is currently executing.
An object that represents the handler that is currently executing.
trans-unit.target: Objet qui représente le gestionnaire en cours d’exécution.

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Web.RequestNotification" /> value that indicates the current <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> event that is processing.
One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.RequestNotification" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Une des valeurs de <see cref="T:System.Web.RequestNotification" />.

trans-unit.source: The object whose <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> method must be called when the <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> connection part of the request is completed.
Enables an object's <see cref="M:System.IDisposable.Dispose" /> method to be called when the <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> connection part of this request is completed.
The subscription token.
Gets the first error (if any) that accumulated when an HTTP request was being processed.
The first exception for the current HTTP request, or <see langword="null" /> if no errors accumulated when the HTTP request was being processed.
trans-unit.target: Première exception pour la requête HTTP actuelle ou <see langword="null" /> si aucune erreur n’a été accumulée pendant le traitement de la requête HTTP.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets an application-level resource.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey" /> property of the requested resource object.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> property of the requested resource object.

Gets an application-level resource object based on the specified <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> properties.
The requested application-level resource object, or <see langword="null" /> if no matching resource object is found.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey" /> property of the requested resource object.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> property of the requested resource object.
A string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object of the requested resource.

Gets an application-level resource object based on the specified <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ClassKey" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> properties, and on the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object.
The requested application-level resource object, which is localized for the specified culture, or <see langword="null" /> if no matching resource object is found.
Gets a page-level resource.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext.VirtualPath" /> property of the local resource object.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> property of the requested resource object.

Gets a page-level resource object based on the specified <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext.VirtualPath" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> properties.
The requested page-level resource object, or <see langword="null" /> if no matching resource object is found.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext.VirtualPath" /> property of the local resource object.
A string that represents the <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> property of the requested resource object.
A string that represents the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object of the requested resource object.

Gets a page-level resource object based on the specified <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ExpressionBuilderContext.VirtualPath" /> and <see cref="P:System.Web.Compilation.ResourceExpressionFields.ResourceKey" /> properties, and on the <see cref="T:System.Globalization.CultureInfo" /> object.
The requested local resource object, which is localized for the specified culture, or <see langword="null" /> if no matching resource object is found.
The configuration section path (in XPath format) and the configuration element name.
Gets the specified configuration section of the current application's default configuration.
The specified section, or <see langword="null" /> if the section does not exist.
The type of service to get.
Returns an object for the current service type.
The current service type, or <see langword="null" /> if no service is found.
Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> object that is responsible for processing the HTTP request.
The object that is responsible for processing the HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Objet chargé de traiter la requête HTTP.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether custom errors are enabled for the current HTTP request.
<see langword="true" /> if custom errors are enabled; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si les erreurs personnalisées sont activées ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the current HTTP request is in debug mode.
<see langword="true" /> if the request is in debug mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si la requête est en mode débogage ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether an <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpApplication" /> event has finished processing.
<see langword="true" /> if the event has finished processing; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Si l’événement a terminé le traitement ; dans le cas contraire, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the request is an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request.
<see langword="true" /> if the request is an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si la requête est une requête <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the connection is upgrading from an HTTP connection to an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> connection.
<see langword="true" /> if the connection is upgrading; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si la connexion est mise à niveau ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets a key/value collection that can be used to organize and share data between a module and a handler during an HTTP request.
A key/value collection that provides access to an individual value in the collection by using a specified key.
trans-unit.target: Collection de clés/valeurs qui fournit un accès à une valeur individuelle de la collection au moyen d’une clé spécifiée.

trans-unit.source: Gets a reference to the page-instrumentation service instance for this request.
The page-instrumentation service instance for this request.
trans-unit.target: Instance du service d'instrumentation de page pour cette requête.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> object for the parent handler.
An <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> object that represents the parent handler, or <see langword="null" /> if no parent handler was found.
trans-unit.target: Un <see cref="T:System.Web.IHttpHandler" /> objet qui représente le gestionnaire parent, ou <see langword="null" /> si aucun gestionnaire parent a été trouvé.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.Profile.ProfileBase" /> object for the current user profile.

If profile properties are defined in the application configuration file and profiles are enabled for the application, an object that represents the current user profile; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Si les propriétés de profil sont définies dans le fichier de configuration d’application et les profils sont activés pour l’application, un objet qui représente le profil utilisateur actuel ; dans le cas contraire, <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: The object that should process the request.
Enables you to specify a handler for the request.
If you set `handler` to `null`, the default handler is used to process the request.
trans-unit.target: Si vous définissez `handler` à `null`, le gestionnaire par défaut est utilisé pour traiter la demande.

trans-unit.source: You can set `handler` to either an asynchronous handler or to an synchronous handler.
trans-unit.target: Vous pouvez définir `handler` soit un gestionnaire asynchrone ou d’un gestionnaire synchrone.

trans-unit.source: The handler must implement the <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.
trans-unit.target: Le gestionnaire doit implémenter le <xref:System.Web.IHttpHandler> interface.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="M:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper.RemapHandler(System.Web.IHttpHandler)" /> method was called after the <see cref="E:System.Web.HttpApplication.MapRequestHandler" /> event occurred.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpRequestBase" /> object for the current HTTP request.
The current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Requête HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpResponseBase" /> object for the current HTTP response.
The current HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: Réponse HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Assigns an internal rewrite path, which lets the requested URL differ from the internal path of the resource.
The replacement path.
Rewrites the URL by using the specified path.
<paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="path" /> is not in the current application's root directory.
The path to rewrite to.
<see langword="true" /> to reset the virtual path; <see langword="false" /> to keep the virtual path unchanged.
Rewrites the URL by using the specified path and a value that specifies whether the virtual path for server resources is modified.
<paramref name="path" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="path" /> is not in the current application's root directory.
The replacement path.
Additional path information for a resource.
The request query string.
Rewrites the URL by using the specified path, path information, and query string information.
The <paramref name="filePath" /> parameter is <see langword="null" />.
The <paramref name="filePath" /> parameter is not in the current application's root directory.
The replacement path.
Additional path information for a resource.
The request query string.
<see langword="true" /> to set the file path used for client resources to the value of the <c>filePath</c> parameter; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
Rewrites the URL by using the specified path, path information, query string information, and a value that specifies whether the client file path is set to the rewrite path.
<paramref name="filePath" /> is <see langword="null" />.
<paramref name="filePath" /> is not in the current application's root directory.
Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpServerUtilityBase" /> object that provides methods that are used when Web requests are being processed.
The server utility object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Objet utilitaire de serveur pour la requête HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.HttpSessionStateBase" /> object for the current HTTP request.
The session-state object for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Objet d’état de session pour la requête HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values that specifies what type of session state behavior is required.
Sets the type of session state behavior that is required in order to support an HTTP request.
The <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A> method overrides the base <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Le <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A> méthode substitue à la base de <xref:System.Web.HttpContextBase.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A> (méthode).

trans-unit.source: To implement the base method, the <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A> method calls the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A> method of the <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> class and passes the `sessionStateBehavior` setting.
trans-unit.target: Pour implémenter la méthode de base, le <xref:System.Web.HttpContextWrapper.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A> les appels de méthode le <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.SetSessionStateBehavior%2A> méthode de la <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> classe et passe le `sessionStateBehavior` paramètre.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule" /> object should skip the authorization check for the current request.
<see langword="true" /> if <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule" /> should skip the authorization check; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si le <see cref="T:System.Web.Security.UrlAuthorizationModule" /> doit ignorer le contrôle d'autorisation ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut est <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether the ASP.NET runtime should call <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.Abort" /> on the thread that is servicing this request when the request times out.
<see langword="true" /> if <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.Abort" /> will be called when the thread times out; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <see cref="M:System.Threading.Thread.Abort" /> est appelé lorsque le thread expire ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: La valeur par défaut est <see langword="true" />.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.ThreadAbortOnTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: Pour plus d'informations, consultez <xref:System.Web.HttpContext.ThreadAbortOnTimeout%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the initial timestamp of the current HTTP request.
The timestamp of the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Horodatage de la requête HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Web.TraceContext" /> object for the current HTTP response.
The trace object for the current HTTP response.
trans-unit.target: Objet de trace pour la réponse HTTP actuelle.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets security information for the current HTTP request.
An object that contains security information for the current HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: Objet qui contient des informations de sécurité pour la requête HTTP active.

trans-unit.source: Gets the negotiated protocol that was sent from the server to the client for an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request.
The negotiated protocol.
trans-unit.target: Protocole négocié.

trans-unit.source: Gets the ordered list of protocols requested by the client.
The requested protocols, or <see langword="null" /> if this is not an <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> request or if no list is present.
trans-unit.target: Protocoles demandés, ou <see langword="null" /> s'il ne s'agit pas d'une requête <see cref="T:System.Web.WebSockets.AspNetWebSocket" /> ou si aucune liste n'est présente.
